description:
**CONTROLLER REQUIRED!!**

Slime Knight is an in-development thesis project being developed by students in the Entertainment Arts and Engineering masters program at the University of Utah.

You are a slime that has been devoured by a gigantic monster (along with the rest of your home!).  After inhabiting a suit of armor belonging to a long-deceased knight, you must fight your way through the beast to rescue your family and escape alive!

Grab enemies and objects using your extendable arm to fling them around and cause mayhem.  Some enemies can be consumed by your slimy appendages, allowing you to absorb some of their properties and give you access to new abilities.

CONTROLS:

Left Analog Stick:  Move

Right Analog Stick:  Extend Arm

Right Trigger:  Grab 

Right Face Button:  Activate ability (after devouring an enemy)

Start Button: Open up the pause menu
